metadata.title: CVE-2015-7557 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The _rsvg_node_poly_build_path function in rsvg-shapes.c in librsvg before2.40.7 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds heap read) via an odd number of elements in a coordinatepair in an SVG document.

criterions.comment: librsvg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
